summary: Represents an animated sprite that can be used as an [Asset](/documentation/Asset) for an [Entity](/documentation/Entity).
remarks: The AnimatedSprite class is a derivative of the [Asset](/documentation/Asset) class and provides the functionality required to turn a sprite sheet into an animation.
By default, the sprite will begin animation as soon as it is loaded and will have an animation speed of 0.2.

properties.name: defaultFrame
properties.description: The index of the frame to display when the sprite is not animating.

properties.name: isAnimating
properties.description: A read only value that indicates whether or not the sprite is currently animating.

properties.name: row
properties.description: The row number of frames to animate between.

properties.name: speed
properties.description: The speed at which to animate through frames in whole and fractional seconds.

methods.name: draw
methods.description: Draws the asset to the [Layer](/documentation/Layer) that the owning [Entity](/documentation/Entity) exists on.

methods.name: startAnimating
methods.description: Start animating the sprite until [stopAnimating](/documentation/AnimatedSprite/stopAnimating) is called.

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
platforms.notes: In addition to these tested browsers, the AnimatedSprite class is supported by any browser that supports the HTML5 canvas.
